transcript.text: this video is going to be about the

and an aluminum into your body with

shots contain 50,000 parts per billion

the safe standard of drinking levels for

regards to aluminum which is just as bad
if not worse than mercury the standard
shop contains between 200 and 500

they are the exact same down the whole

things are gonna happen the rates of

we just need to accept the reality of

these vaccines are failing not even

and really when you look at the history
